entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as a person who is being spoken to by Professor Snape and is involved in the activity of cutting up roots.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person whose roots are being cut up by Weasley and who is complaining about it to Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the professor who is giving instructions to Weasley and Malfoy, and who is observing their activity.

relationships.description: Weasley cuts up Malfoy's roots at the instruction of Professor Snape.
Professor Snape gives instructions to Weasley to cut up Malfoy's roots.
Malfoy complains to Professor Snape about Weasley cutting up his roots.
